ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISCHANGED(CSM_Health_Rating__c), LEN ( CSM_Health_Notes__c) = 0, ISBLANK(TEXT((Sentiment_Root_Cause__c))),
NOT(ISPICKVAL(CSM_Health_Rating__c, "Green")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(CSM_Health_Rating__c, "--")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(CSM_Health_Rating__c,"")), NOT( AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(CSM_Health_Rating__c), "Red"), ISPICKVAL(CSM_Health_Rating__c, "Yellow") )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must fill out the CSM health notes and root cause prior to changing the CSM health status to yellow or red.
